name: Oliver's Tale
storyline:
Three centuries ago Oliver opened the "Source of the Five Magics" that unleashed the power of magic and, in an instant, humanity gained access to its might.
People began to use the power of the five magics, creating unseen technologies, flourishing agriculture, and weapons of immense destructive power within just a few decades. However, the world we see today was shaped not only by the wonders of magic but also by the terrible war, which was called "The last war". It devastated the earth, so the remains of civilization have to live on floating islands above the clouds.
After three hundred years Oliver awakens on one of those islands, and the journey begins.
summary: Dive into Oliver's Tale, an enthralling action-adventure RPG with a rich narrative, immersive gameplay, and engaging crafting elements. Set in a post-apocalyptic world where ancient magic resurfaces, shaping a new world. Once responsible for civilization's downfall, Oliver is now on a quest to restore balance to a shattered world.
